    • About me

    What you need to know

    Experienced graphic designer specialized in both frontend and backend development with over two years of industry expertise.

    Passionate about the profound impact that software engineering has on the creation of products for clients and companies. Committed to producing scalable, clean, and optimized code.

    Having worked both in companies and as a freelancer Allowed me to adopt the main skills of each work style, achieving effective collaboration in multidisciplinary teams
    but also the ability to be autonomous when facing challenges

    If you seek a versatile professional who can bring together technical proficiency and inventive solutions to your fullstack development projects, I am the ideal candidate for you!

    Experience

    What i've accomplished over the years

    1. Freelance Latest

      2021 - Now

      As a freelance professional, I've undertaken diverse projects for multiple clients, enabling me to amass expertise in frontend development technologies. Honed my communication skills, fostering fruitful client relationships and observing the transformative impact of developing online solutions for their businesses.

    2. Samsung Mobile trainer

      2019 - 2021

      Traversed the country to visit various sales locations, providing professional training to sellers on Samsung mobile products. Primarily conducted informative presentations aimed at educating and empowering sellers to achieve their objectives.

    3. Graphic designer EVO

      2010 - 2019

      Served as the principal lead designer for a startup travel agency, responsible for designing the majority of their promotional materials including flyers and advertising campaigns. Successfully cultivated an online following of approximately 30,000 individuals across various social media platforms.
